lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Justin Bieber/Shawn Mendes/Daniel Caesar/Adam King Feeney/Mustafa Ahmed
[00:01.000] 作曲 : Justin Bieber/Shawn Mendes/Daniel Caesar/Adam King Feeney/Mustafa Ahmed
[00:13.289]You put me on a pedestal and tell me I'm the best
[00:19.877]Raise me up into the sky until I'm short of breath
[00:26.446]Fill me up with confidence, I say what's in my chest
[00:29.724]Spill my words and tear me down until there's nothing left
[00:32.973]Rearrange the pieces just to fit me with the rest, yeah
[00:38.004]But what if I, what if I trip?
[00:41.180]What if I, what if I fall?
[00:44.527]Then am I the monster?
[00:48.258]Just let me know
[00:51.022]And what if I, what if I sin?
[00:54.143]And what if I, what if I break? Yeah
[00:58.126]Then am I the monster?
[01:01.527]Just let me know, yeah
[01:05.928]I was fifteen when the world put me on a pedestal
[01:09.142]I had big dreams of doing shows and making memories
[01:12.305]Made some bad moves trying to act cool, upset by their jealousy
[01:15.489]Lifting me up (Lifting me up), lifting me up (Yeah)
[01:19.090]And tearing me down (Down), tearing me down (Down, down)
[01:22.531]I'll take responsibility for everything I've done (Yeah)
[01:25.675]Holding it against me like you're the holy one (Yeah)
[01:31.810]I had a chip on my shoulder, had to let it go
[01:35.362]'Cause unforgiveness keeps them in control
[01:38.743]I came in with good intentions then I let it go
[01:41.900]And now I really wanna know
[01:44.125]But what if I, what if I trip? (Oh)
[01:46.829]What if I, what if I fall? (I fall)
[01:50.232]Then am I the monster? (Am I the monster?)
[01:54.197]Just let me know (Let me know)
[01:57.345]And what if I, what if I sin? (Oh)
[02:00.095]And what if I, what if I break? Yeah
[02:03.373]Then am I the monster? (Am I the monster?)
[02:07.313]Just let me know
[02:10.215]Please just let me know
[02:26.182]Please don't let me fall
[02:32.644]Oh, please don't let me fall
tlyric:
[00:13.289]你将我推向神坛 认为我举世无双
[00:19.877]携我高飞天际 直至我喘不过气
[00:26.446]令我胸有成竹 直言不讳
[00:29.724]吐露真心话语 将我撕裂摧毁得一无所有
[00:32.973]重新拼接我残缺的碎片 只为让我顺应世俗
[00:38.004]但倘若我深受羁绊
[00:41.180]倘若我坠跌无尽深渊
[00:44.527]那我就是面目全非的恶魔了吗
[00:48.258]何不让我心明了
[00:51.022]可倘若我罪不可赦
[00:54.143]倘若我已残损不堪
[00:58.126]那我就是面目全非的恶魔了吗
[01:01.527]何不令我心知晓
[01:05.928]举世瞩目时 我年仅十五
[01:09.142]心怀演出梦想 留下回味无穷的美好回忆
[01:12.305]惹是生非 佯装得不谙世事 却因他们嫉妒而不安
[01:15.489]捧得我遥比天高
[01:19.090]转身又将我撕裂得支离破碎
[01:22.531]我将为自己的所作所为负责
[01:25.675]可你却如圣贤者般以我曾犯下的过错批判我
[01:31.810]我心怀怨恨 却也无可奈何
[01:35.362]因为心存芥蒂 仇怨便不得排解
[01:38.743]我本怀善意而来 却只得放手
[01:41.900]如今我真的很想知晓
[01:44.125]但倘若我深受羁绊
[01:46.829]倘若我坠跌无尽深渊
[01:50.232]那我就是面目全非的恶魔了吗
[01:54.197]何不让我心明了
[01:57.345]可倘若我罪不可赦
[02:00.095]倘若我已残损不堪
[02:03.373]那我就是面目全非的恶魔了吗
[02:07.313]何不令我心知晓
[02:10.215]只需让我理清思绪
[02:26.182]请不要再让我堕落了
[02:32.644]噢 请不要再让我沉沦了
